DOC.brief_summary: This study presents the investigators results on patients treated for infection in the implemented hip prosthesis. Debridement and prosthesis retention is the method, followed by antibiotic treatment. The investigators present treatment results, predisposing factors and microbiological data.
DOC.brief_title: Treatment Results on Patients With Debridement and Prosthesis Retention in the Hip
DOC.criteria: Infection in prothesis in hip treated with debridement and prosthesis retention Other technique
